mention.text: Diana Orban , a spokeswoman for Cruise Lines International Association , a New York-based group that has 35 members , notes that only two people have been killed on cruise ships serving U.S. ports since 1970 -LRB- Both were passengers on the Scandinavian Sun , another Bahamian ship
